Module kivakit.kernel
Package com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.messaging.repeaters

Interface RepeaterMixin

All Superinterfaces:
Broadcaster, Listener, Mixin, NamedObject, Receiver, Repeater, Transceiver, Transmitter
All Known Subinterfaces:
ComponentFunction<From,​To>, ComponentMixin, ComponentSupplier<Value>, ResourceFolderResolver, ResourceResolver
All Known Implementing Classes:
CollectionsUnitTest, File.Resolver, Folder.Resolver, HttpGetResourceResolver, IntersectionTest, IteratorTest, KryoUnitTest, Package.Resolver, PackageResource.Resolver, SetDifferencerTest, SetOperationTest, UnionTest, UnitTest, WithoutTest
public interface RepeaterMixin extends Repeater, Mixin
A stateful Mixin that can be used when a class can't extend BaseRepeater to implement the Repeater interface.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
See Also:
Mixin

  • Method Details

    • addListener

      default void addListener​(Listener listener, Filter<Transmittable> filter)
      Adds a listener to this broadcaster that wants to receive future messages. This is the mirror method of Listener.listenTo(Broadcaster) as both methods achieve the same thing.
      Specified by:
      addListener in interface Broadcaster
      Parameters:
      listener - Listener to broadcast to. Implementations should ignore null listeners.
